title: Do homeopathic remedies work? (video) - American Chemical Society
description: American Chemical Society: Chemistry for Life.
cleaned_text: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE | May 10, 2016 Do homeopathic remedies work? (video) WASHINGTON, May 10, 2016 — Homeopathic remedies are marketed as effective alternatives to traditional medicine. But do they work? To answer this question, Reactions looks at the history of homeopathy, its principles and the scientific studies of various treatments. Check it out here: [https://youtu.be/Lq29f14X1t0](https://youtu.be/Lq29f14X1t0). Subscribe to our weekly series at [http://bit.ly/ACSReactions](http://bit.ly/ACSReactions)
